pasugiya janadhipathiwaranayedi sandhanaye palath sabha manthriwarun dedeneku janadhipathi maithripala sirisenata sahaya dakwimata thiranaya kala.kese wethath, basnahira palath sabhawe bahuthara balaya laba ganima sadaha manthriwarun samaga sakachcha karamin sitina bawayi palath sabhawe wipaksha nayaka manju shri arangala sadahan kale.me athara, sandhanayata balaya himi anekuth palath sabhawala da idiriyedi bala peraliyak sidukirimata sakachcha pawathwamin sitina bawa ema palath sabhawala wipaksha aaranchi marga sadahan kala.
